data.name: Deloitte Digital
data.description: Currently working on a website with Next.js, React.js, Redux Toolkit, RTK Query, HTML5, CSS3 (SASS/SCSS, responsive design), Material UI and Ant Design, I've also made a middleware server API with Nest.js and Typescript.

data.name: Beta80 Group
data.description: Built an entity-relationship database using T-SQL which contained data about songs and authors and then I've built a Java7 application to fetch the data from the database in order to show them in the UI using the Java Swing library. Also stored the user credentials in the database with security checks.

data.name: Nyx Solutions
data.description: Developed different wordpress websites, from a single page application to more complex ones, with forms and newsletter subscriptions.

data.name: Pokedex Website
data.description: Built a website that allows the user to search data about a Pokemon with React and Typescript (into Next.js framework). Used the open source RESTful API PokeAPIv2 to fetch the JSON data. Open points: complex filter in the homepage, dark mode theme

data.name: NIST Lightweight Cryptography Competition
data.description: Made a theoretical attack to the Elephant (V1.1) cipher with the help of a script written in python and with a SAT Solver library.

data.name: Univerity of Milan
data.description: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science. My favorite courses were Algorithms and Data Structures, Databases, Software Engineer and Design Patterns, Cryptography
